definitions.text: the place where some action occurs
examples: the police returned to the scene of the crime
their parting was a sad scene

definitions.text: the visual percept of a region
examples: the most desirable feature of the park are the beautiful views

definitions.text: a consecutive series of pictures that constitutes a unit of action in a film
a situation treated as an observable object
examples: the religious scene in England has changed in the last century

definitions.text: a subdivision of an act of a play
examples: the first act has three scenes

definitions.text: graphic art consisting of the graphic or photographic representation of a visual percept
examples: he painted scenes from everyday life
figure 2 shows photographic and schematic views of the equipment

definitions.text: the context and environment in which something is set
examples: the perfect setting for a ghost story

definitions.text: the painted structures of a stage set that are intended to suggest a particular locale
examples: they worked all night painting the scenery
